column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The aspiring songstress wishes to practice her singing without interruption.
Speak with the aspiring songstress.
Stand watch near the Clave, and defeat any threats that appear.
Speak with the aspiring songstress.
Speak with the aspiring songstress.
What have we here? An admirer, come to exult in the purity of my vocal splendor?
No...? I...well...<sigh>
Grrr! You would feel <Emphasis>honored</Emphasis> to meet me if I was ever allowed to test the limits of my instrument!
One day I shall be the talk of Eulmore─nay, of all Norvrandt─but first I must secure a venue in which to practice.
If I sing at but a fraction of my full volume, the cretins around here become so unreasonably angry! Insulting, even! Thus I have taken to finding a quiet spot near the coast.
Yet even there, my scales and trills seem to drive the wildlife into a frenzy. I can scarce begin my practice before I'm forced to flee from some enraged beast!
Hmmm, you look to have seen your fair share of fighting. What say you to standing guard and allowing <Emphasis>me</Emphasis> my fair share of singing?
Pretty, pretty please...?
Ah, 'tis so invigorating to sing here─I feel as if my voice rings clear across the sea.
Now, if you would be so kind as to intercept any nuisances before they ruin my practice, I should be most appreciative!
The sound of singing is almost entirely drowned out by the waves crashing down below...
Ah, that was simply wonderful! You don't know how long it's been since I was last able to sing to my heart's content!

And it's all thanks to you!♪
Let us return to town so I might show you the proper gratitude!
Thank you ever so much for your help! I almost wish I could keep you on as an assistant...
I know I seem to be struggling through a rough patch at the moment, but once I make a name for myself in Eulmore's cabaret show, the privileged will be climbing over each other to offer me patronage!
And then, when I'm wealthy and famous, you shall have the reward you deserve. For now, however, this is all I can afford... Consider it an advance payment!
